DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate pharmacodynamic profile ( blood glucose urinary glucose excursion ) ASP1941 patient type 2 diabetes mellitus . Safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics also evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: A Study ASP1941 Japanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetic patient least 12 week HbA1c value 7.0 10.0 % screen Fasting plasma glucose ≥ 126mg/dL < 240mg/dL screen Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 20.0 45.0 kg/m2 . Type 1 diabetes mellitus patient Serum creatinine > upper limit normal Proteinuria（albumin/creatinine ratio > 300mg/g） Dysuria and/or urinary tract infection Significant renal , hepatic cardiovascular disease Severe gastrointestinal disease
